definition: ancient name for go (Chinese board game)

sentences.english: But they use game theory to reward good translations with badges, yes?

sentences.english: Using analysis method of games theory to expound the supervision and management to power supervision and management committee.
sentences.chinese: 运用博弈论分析方法阐述对电监会的监管。

sentences.english: The snowdrift game is a celebrated game used as metaphor for investigating cooperative behaviors between selfish individuals.
sentences.chinese: 著名的雪堆博弈是自私个体间的合作行为的一个隐喻。

sentences.english: In the paper, a multi-stage sequential-move game model is set up.
sentences.chinese: 论文建立了连锁故障预防的多阶段序贯博弈模型。

sentences.english: We develop a game-theoretic model of this Effect.
sentences.chinese: 我们建立了这个效应的一个博弈论模型。

sentences.english: “This is a zero-sum game between wages and profits,” he points out.

sentences.english: Chapter two comes to game-theoretical semantics.
sentences.chinese: 第二章着重讨论了博弈论语义学。

sentences.english: Recently, people see much significant improvement on the cooperation environment of Chinese banking business.

sentences.english: Consider the problem of pricing games between the regulated enterprises and the regulator.
sentences.chinese: 考虑管制企业与管制者间的定价博弈问题。

sentences.english: Looked from the gambling angle that Shenhua this act is certainly undisputable .
sentences.chinese: 从博弈的角度看，申花此举当然无可厚非。

sentences.english: This paper examines a serious attempt at a post-Gricean game theoretic account of language communication.
sentences.chinese: 时代语用研究领域里利用博弈论解析语言交际的尝试。

sentences.english: This minimax logic can also be extended to games like chess .
sentences.chinese: 极大极小逻辑也被用于其它博弈，比如国际象棋中。

sentences.english: This article is to analyze the influencing factor of apparent information asymmetry in medical dispute game.
sentences.chinese: 探讨医疗纠纷博弈表观信息不对称性的影响因素。

sentences.english: The games have been played for years, and this one was no exception. The F.B.I.

definition: a two-man saw/fig. to-and-fro between two sides
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
